data.message: Sorry, but I know a young Aussie lad he would shit all over Carhartt, so sorry Mr E, and yes I did notice so much has SOLD OUT, but is that because Carhartt is the only retailer to sell your name? Important word is RETAILER, not DESIGNER! Come Down Under and we will show you DESIGN!

replies.message: It's because carhartt is from Detroit...
OMFG LMAO STFU IF U THINK U ARE ON EMINEMS LEVEL IN ANY WAY

I don't think you quite understood my comment, it was against the retailer, not EMINEM, and as for being at his level you must really need your eyes checked because I don't have an artistic bone in my body and I'm not young nor am I male, which the artist I was talking about is! And I was talking about design, not performing. Also surely you realise perfumes, clothing etc is rarely created by the legends they collaborate with? Why would I be a EMINEM fan if I thought I was better than him? That would be ludicrous! Do you think I'm less of a fan because I don't put "love you" or "marry me" and I don't come from Detroit? I'm an Aussie, mate, and in case you didn't know this EMINEM is HUGE Downunder as well! One last thing, if you had read my comment properly we would never have had this convo, MATE!
